name: Spirits Within: The Washing Machine?
description:
Take control of two spirits in their quest to find their missing friend. Avoid the house folk, possess the items to your advantage to achieve your goals. You'll have to coordinate the spirits' moves and time everything right! Even holding the doors open is crucial to your cause! Are you up to the challenge ?

This game is quite DIFFICULT so we decided to provide a full walkthrough in case if you get frustrated and stop playing missing all the content we created:

ENJOY!

Submission to the Mini Jam 25
Theme: Spirits  Limit: No Text

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Possess Items

TAB - Switch between the spirits

Programming, Sound by Brainoid
Music by Brainoid  & TheYagich01
Art by Elthen
